text: In medicine, people talk about complications if a disease or condition a patient has gets worse. This makes it more difficult (or more complicated, that is where the word is from) to treat. *Some people are allergic to certain anesthetics; they will have an allergic shock. This makes surgery more difficult. *People with osteoporosis may have their ribs or sternum broken when they undergo cardiopulmonary resuscitation. Category:Health problems
title: Complication
